John 3:16.english: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son...
John 3:16.pidgin: Because Papa God love the world well-well, e give im only Son...
John 3:16.yoruba: Nítorí pé Ọlọrun fẹ́ ayé tó bẹ́ẹ̀, ó fi Ọmọ rẹ̀ kan ṣoṣo fún wa...

Psalm 23:1.english: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
Psalm 23:1.pidgin: The Lord na my Shepherd; I no go lack.
Psalm 23:1.yoruba: Oluwa ni oluso aguntan mi; emi ki yio fẹ́ nkankan.
